Metadata.description: Bitomun is the key to unlocking the answers for those who want to learn about Bitcoin We also support those who have the qualifications and organizations to spread the correct Bitcoin culture and expand the industry

Bitomun is the key to unlocking the answers for those who want to learn about Bitcoin 
We also support those who have the qualifications and organizations to spread the correct Bitcoin culture and expand the industry

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Please describe what you'd like to discuss

consultingForm.success: Your consultation request has been successfully submitted. We will contact you soon.
consultingForm.error: An error occurred while submitting your request. Please try again.

hero.title: Education
hero.description: We provide specialized learning and services focused on Bitcoin. For paid education, a certain percentage of all payments is used as donations. These donations are used for free Bitcoin education and industry expansion.

offline.title: Offline Education
offline.description: Learn Bitcoin through in-person communication with experts

online.title: Online Education
online.description: We offer online education where you can learn various Bitcoin courses at your desired time and place

targets.item1: Those who cannot attend offline education
targets.item2: Those who learn better through online courses
targets.item3: Those who want to study at their preferred time
targets.item4: Those who want to study without spatial constraints

bookClub.title: Bitcoin Reading Club
bookClub.description: We gather to discuss Bitcoin-related books that accurately explain Bitcoin

targets.item1: Those who don't read books well alone
targets.item2: Those who want to share opinions about books with others
targets.item3: Those who want to read good books

consulting.title: 1:1 Consulting
consulting.description: 1:1 consulting for high-net-worth individuals to protect your valuable time
consulting.fullDescription: Suitable for business people for whom time is money and those with significant assets but find it difficult to learn new technologies. All processes are tailored to the customer's situation and include follow-up support, not just one-time service.
consulting.recommendation: This consulting is recommended for those with assets over 1 billion won.
consulting.dialogDescription: Please fill in the information below and our representative will contact you after review.

level1.title: Level 1
level1.description: Learn the basic concepts and operating principles of Bitcoin, its differences from other assets, and future utilization plans

targets.item2: Those who want to learn about Bitcoin
targets.item3: Those who want to learn about money
targets.item5: Those who work hard but feel life is getting harder
targets.item6: Those who don't want to worry about retirement
targets.item7: Those who don't have time to learn about the economy

level2.title: Level 2
level2.description: A course for beginners starting self-custody, learning from experts how to use the minimum functions necessary for self-custody among various options

targets.item1: Those who want to store Bitcoin securely
targets.item2: Those who want to keep Bitcoin in their own name
targets.item3: Those who want to store Bitcoin the way exchanges do
targets.item4: Those who want to use Bitcoin freely from time and space constraints
targets.item5: Those who want to try using Bitcoin
targets.item6: Those who want to gain financial freedom

level3.title: Level 3
level3.description: Beyond self-custody, learn about Bitcoin mining, full nodes, and how to use them directly

targets.item1: Those curious about what Lightning, mining, and full nodes are
targets.item3: Those who want to try using Lightning
targets.item4: Those who have decided to mine and are curious about basic connection and operation methods (home mining)
targets.item5: Those who want to run a full node to protect their Bitcoin
targets.item6: Those who want to run a full node for the Bitcoin ecosystem

guidesTutorials.title: Guides & Tutorials
guidesTutorials.description: Written or video-based educational materials that provide step-by-step instructions on specific topics related to Bitcoin and/or Lightning Network development.

classesCourses.title: Classes & Courses
classesCourses.description: Formal educational programs, either online or in-person, that offer a structured curriculum covering various aspects of Bitcoin and/or Lightning Network development.

certifications.title: Developer Certifications
certifications.description: Programs that evaluate the skills and knowledge of developers through examinations, resulting in a certification that validates proficiency in Bitcoin and/or Lightning Network development.

books.title: Developer Books
books.description: Published books that offer in-depth information and insights into various areas of Bitcoin and/or Lightning Network development, often serving as comprehensive references.
